data.prayer: Please, teach the 10,530 believers in Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 10,530 believers in the county of Zhangjiajie.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Ghao-Xong, Eastern people. Make the Ghao-Xong, Eastern people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Zhangjiajie words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the county of Zhangjiajie, Hunan, China has a population of 138,800.

We estimate Zhangjiajie has 10,530 people who might know Jesus, 2,242 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 126,028 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Zhangjiajie access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”
